column1: A kelp forest, its long, thick vines extending towards the surface.
A creature so large it is difficult to comprehend, slowly swimming in the distance.
A field of bioluminescent life-forms that look like corn ears.
A dark, narrow canyon with serrated clam-like organisms attached to both sides, making it look like a gaping mouth.
Incredibly long fragile-looking organisms, gently floating in the current.
Hundreds of small organisms devouring the carcass of a larger creature.
Coral-like formations, spanning hundreds of feet, creating incredible spirals and other exotic shapes.
Large, ancient pipelines, big enough to fit a standing human.
The rusty remains of some sort of boat or ship.
Small jellyfish-like organisms float in all directions, as far as the eye can see.
